definitions.definition: a woman who performs on the stage, on television or in films, especially as a profession

examples.text: The Oscar-winning actress has taken a break from acting.
the lead actress from a hit show
In 1940 he married actress Jane Wyman.

definitions.definition: a woman who plays a part, pretending by her behaviour to be a particular kind of person

examples.text: I became a very good actress and they nearly always believed me.
